name: Cooking Chicken Soup
description:
Pregnant Sue wants to eat a delicious chicken soup, so let’s help her prepare it in this cool cooking game for girls! First of all, go shopping for the needed ingredients. Rapunzel is going to give you a list with all the items you have to buy. After that, enter Sue's kitchen and follow her instructions to learn how to make the best chicken soup ever!
A soon to be mommy is eager to get a meal in so start this pregnant princess chicken soup cooking game as she is hungrier than ever and does not know how to make it as good as you do. We should at least one soup per day so write down this recipe. It is one of the best I have ever tried! Good luck!
